The Westman Naturalists are organized by a team of volunteers.

Interesting in getting involved? Send us an [email](mailto:westman.naturalists@gmail.com)!


### Alex Koiter

::: {.column-margin}
![](images/alex.jpg)
:::

[**President**]{.large}<br>
**Committees**: Speakers

Alex is an Associate Professor in Geography and Environment at Brandon University.
Alex enjoys leading trips to explore local Westman landscapes and glacial history.



### Jen Wasko 
::: {.column-margin}
![](images/)
:::

[**Vice-President**]{.large}<br>
**Committees**: Financial and Planning

Jen is an instructor of Horticulture in the School of Agriculture & Environment 
at Assiniboine Community College. When not showing students how to divide rhubarb,
Jen enjoys getting out in nature with her family. 


### Kathryn Hyndman

::: {.column-margin}
![](images/kathryn_sm.jpg)
:::

[**Secretary Treasurer**]{.large}<br>
**Committees**: Financial and Planning

Hello! Kathryn is a retired registered nurse and former nursing professor at Brandon University. Her passions include scuba diving and travelling. Many of her trips involve watching and photographing birds and animals as well as marine fish.
